string-array.name: pronunciation
string-array.item: Allahumma antas salaam wa min kas salaam taba rakta ya dhal ja laa li wal ik raam
Allahumma a\'inni ala dhikrika wa shukrika wa husni ibadatika (x3)

string-array.name: azkar_english
string-array.item: I ask Allah to forgive me
O\' Allah, You are the Peace, and You are the Source of Peace, You are Blessed, Oh Possessor of Glory and Honor
O\' Allah Assist me in remembering you, in thanking you, and worshipping you in the best of manners

string-array.name: arabic
string-array.item: أَسْـتَغْفِرُ الله، أَسْـتَغْفِرُ الله، أَسْـتَغْفِرُ الله.
اللّهُـمَّ أَنْـتَ السَّلامُ ، وَمِـنْكَ السَّلام ، تَبارَكْتَ يا ذا الجَـلالِ وَالإِكْـرام .
اللَّهُمَّ أَعِنِّي عَلَى ذِكْرِكَ وَشُكْرِكَ وَحُسْنِ عِبَادَتِكَ. (ثلاثا)
